title: Career Distractions
itunes:title: Career Distractions
description:
This week we opened the phone lines to see if our listeners have ever sacrificed their relationship over their career, after reports came out about singer Adele's relationship disrupting rehearsals. Also, after Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to the nurses that made $1.5 million selling fake vaccination cards, we opened the phone lines to see if our listeners thought they should be arrested for their come up.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
